channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A common parasite in the brain is far more active than we thought

item.title: This spider’s “pearl necklace” was living parasites
item.description: What looked like a pearl necklace on a tiny spider turned out to be parasitic mite larvae. Scientists identified the mites as a new species, marking t...

item.title: Radio waves revealed what happened before a star exploded
item.description: For the first time, astronomers have captured radio signals from a rare exploding star, exposing what happened in the years leading up to its death. T...

item.title: A sudden signal flare reveals the hidden partner behind fast radio bursts
